JOHANNESBURG , May 19 ( Reuters ) - South African mobile operator Vodacom Group said on Monday it had reached an agreement to buy unlisted telecoms firm Neotel in a deal worth 7 billion rand ( $ 676 million ) although it would not assume any of the company 's debt .
